item.title: PyOhio 2010: Splunking With Python
item.description:
Description

Splunking With Python

Presented by Benjamin W. Smith

Getting dirty with the Splunk API and various other sysadmin tasks with Python.
item.dc:creator: Benjamin W. Smith

item.title: Coding for everyone
item.description:
Summary

Programming is hard, let's keep it simple. This is a reminder of some common sense things we can do better, as well as observations and examples of where we can improve our code for the next guy, even if the next guy is you.
item.dc:creator: Benjamin W. Smith
